section.title: Bookmarks category
section.para: This section describes the Bookmark category in the LDAP Browser view.
Bookmarks could be used to quickly access frequently used entries.

simplesect.title: New Bookmark
simplesect.para:
To create a new bookmark select an entry or search result and choose
New Bookmark... from the context menu.

simplesect.title: Navigation
simplesect.para:
With the
Open Bookmark in DIT action the bookmark entry could be located in the DIT.
